name: Kakehashi, Inc.
description: Developer of a pharmacy experience platform designed to support patient satisfaction and work style reforms in pharmacies. The company's SaaS-based platform streamlines various pharmacy operations by automatically drafting patient records and providing services that can improve the patient experience itself, enabling pharmacies to operate efficiently.
